attributes.action: Get rid of all mp's and start again
attributes.background: Leave or remain it's time for everyone to unite and agree one thing. Our mp's are useless!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you would like to happen. 

If you'd like a general election you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480

If you would like something to replace the House of Commons you could start a petition about that.
